title: Meet Rekta!
intro: Hello! I'm "Rekta", your radiation guide. My name is a combination of "Reactor" and "Energy" (Tenaga), two very important things in the nuclear world. I'm a robot specifically designed to accompany you in exploring the radiation zone safely.
mission: My main mission is to be your 'eyes and ears'. I'm equipped with a dosimeter to measure the total radiation exposure you receive and a survey meter to determine the dose rate around you. Together, we will learn to apply the most important radiation protection principles: "Time, Distance, and Shielding".
funFact: My inspiration comes from research reactors in Indonesia that are used for research and production of radioisotopes for medical and industrial purposes. Just like reactor energy that must be managed carefully, I will help you manage radiation exposure as low as possible!
